The claim being fact: checked is that "millions could lose their health care coverage and be forced into a government pool" under the new health care law.
The expert: s verdict states that the ruling on this claim remains unchanged after fact-checking.
The expert explains that while Obama: s health care plan aimed to leave the current system in place, some of the regulations and changes implemented could potentially affect how health insurance companies offer plans and the decisions made by employers regarding health coverage.
